CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solar power |
| tandem structures |
| single junction structures |
| PSCs |

The material names identified in the paragraph are "solar power," "tandem structures," "single junction structures," and "PSCs" (perovskite solar cells). These terms are mentioned as materials that are used or developed in the context of the passage.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| tandem structures |
| single junction structures |
| PSCs |

After reviewing the list of entities, I have removed "solar power" as it is a more general term that refers to a type of energy rather than a specific material. The remaining entities, "tandem structures," "single junction structures," and "PSCs" (perovskite solar cells), are more clearly material names and are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.
